title: Cannabis Extraction
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Lincoln Johnson, Co-Founder, CEO + CTO of EnCann, returns to the podcast to catch us up on the extraction space ("we're going to see a big shift") and his journey since we talked previously back in 2019. A fantastic take on starting up a cannabis business, navigating the industry, and what Lincoln learned from a long (and ultimately successful) arbitration process.  Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
